items.sentence: I think we should wait another half an hour.

Tom plays clarinet in a Dixieland jazz band.
Tom didn't let his children watch the movie.
I know Tom is a lot older than my father is.

Tom carried the box of books to the library.
Tom should've said something, but he didn't.
We've been here for the last couple of days.
